title: Book
description: In the bestselling tradition of Seinlanguage, Couplehood and My Point . . . and I Do Have One, comes "Whoopi". Here the Oscar -winning actress and comedian offers her own unique take on the world today. Performed by Goldberg herself, this audiobook is as entertaining, outrageous and as real as the woman herself. 4 cassettes. (Biography)
author: Whoopi Goldberg
